item.title: CVE-2021-24480|2024-08-03T19:35:19.561Z -- unknown -- event%20geek
item.description: The Event Geek WordPress plugin through 2.5.2 does not sanitise or escape its "Use your own " setting before outputting it in the page, leading to an authenticated (admin+) stored Cross-Site Scripting issue
